Package service.exceptions

package service.exceptions
The service.exceptions package contains the exception definitions for Service-layer operations.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    service
    The service package contains the class definitions used in the Service-layer.
    service.dto
    The service.dto package contains the class definitions of the DTO classes.
  • Exceptions
    Class
    Description
    BaseServiceException
    The BaseServiceException class is the super class and the main triggering point for all Service-layer sub-classes.
    NoDataProvidedException
    The NoDataProvidedException class is triggered when no data have been passed from the Registration form to the controller.
    NoFirstnameException
    The NoFirstnameException class is triggered when the Firstname form field is empty.
    ParticipantNotAddedException
    The ParticipantNotAddedException class is triggered when there is an error in adding a new Participant record to the database.
    ParticipantNotFoundException
    The ParticipantNotFoundException class is triggered when a Participant record is not found in the database for either one of the following three operations: update, delete, get.
